title: I32
content:
CommentComponent(kind=text, text=Represents a 32-bit integer constant instruction.

Even though , value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=I32, value=kwasm.ast.instruction.NumericConstantInstruction.I32) CommentComponent(kind=text, text= can technically hold unsigned 32-bit integers as well, use Int here for simplicity, and if the number needs to be unsigned - convert it at the use-site.

, value=null)
